# mediaItems

**Instance Property**

The media items for which to search.

## Declaration

```swift
var mediaItems: [INMediaItem]? { get }
```

## Discussion

A media item such as a song, TV show, or podcast episode. Although the array can contain more than one [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INMediaItem] object, the system uses only the first item in the array. You set [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSearchForMediaIntent/mediaItems] when creating the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSearchForMediaIntent] object.

## Searching for Media

- **mediaSearch**: The location to search for the media item.

items.description: The location to search for the media item.
